column4: anyone know if it's possible to add more increments to the gnome CPU scaling applet?
It's not. The increments you have are a property of your CPU.
the windows 7 installation can do 100 different increments... so how can that be true?
As far as I know, there's no CPU that can step in speed to 100 different increments. Unless there's something going on I'm not familiar with, I'd guess most of those don't do much.
